alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 8:23PM CDT until May 28 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CHERRY COUNTY... At 823 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Medicine Lake to 21 miles south of Merriman to 30 miles southeast of Gordon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Indian Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road and Highway 61 crossing the Snake River. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 194 and 209. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
